scripts.clean: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && deno fmt src
scripts.dts: yarn tsc -d src/getDbObj.ts >/dev/null || echo done  && mv src/getDbObj.d.ts dist/  && rm src/getDbObj.js
scripts.prebuild: cp -rf ../diff/src/diff.js dist/ && deno bundle --import-map ../../import_map.json --no-check --unstable src/getDbObj.ts dist/getDbObj.js && cp -rf src/*js dist/ && yarn tsc || echo ok
